title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
description: When importing a new image into the layout, it fails to update and still displays the original image.
OB: When importing new 'image1.jpg' into the layout, the original image is still displayed.
EB: The expected behavior is that the new image 'image1.jpg' should be displayed after importing.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:

1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view.
2. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the outline image.
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
4. Observe that the original image is still displayed, instead of the newly renamed 'image1.jpg'.
